message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750,000.

Hi Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I understand your desire to work within a budget, but $750,000 is significantly below its true value and my minimum selling price.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $900,000. I believe this price point balances both our interests.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value and condition of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850,000.
